nodes.description: Calculate the value of the mathematical expression.

code_variants.CODE_0C:
import math
term1 = 0.345 / math.tan(0.765)
term2 = math.exp(0.23)
term3 = math.log10(45)
result = term1 + term2 + term3
return {"result_0C": result}
